name: Process
description: These charts detail the overall performance of the cockroach process running on this server.

data.name: sys.cpu.user.ns
data.description: Total user cpu time in nanoseconds

data.name: sys.cpu.sys.ns
data.description: Total system cpu time in nanoseconds

data.name: sys.cpu.user.percent
data.description: Current user cpu percentage

data.name: sys.cpu.sys.percent
data.description: Current system cpu percentage

data.name: sys.rss
data.description: Current process RSS

data.name: sys.fd.open
data.description: Process open file descriptors

data.name: sys.fd.softlimit
data.description: Process open FD soft limit

data.name: sys.uptime
data.description: Process uptime in seconds

data.name: sys.cgocalls
data.description: Total number of cgo calls

data.name: sys.cgo.allocbytes
data.description: Current bytes of memory allocated by cgo

data.name: sys.cgo.totalbytes
data.description: Total bytes of memory allocated by cgo, but not released

data.name: sys.goroutines
data.description: Current number of goroutines

data.name: sys.go.allocbytes
data.description: Current bytes of memory allocated by go

data.name: sys.go.totalbytes
data.description: Total bytes of memory allocated by go, but not released

data.name: node-id
data.description: node ID with labels for advertised RPC and HTTP addresses

data.name: build.timestamp
data.description: Build information

data.name: security.certificate.expiration.ca
data.description: Expiration timestamp in seconds since Unix epoch for the CA certificate. 0 means no certificate or error.

data.name: security.certificate.expiration.node
data.description: Expiration timestamp in seconds since Unix epoch for the node certificate. 0 means no certificate or error.

data.name: clock-offset.meannanos
data.description: Mean clock offset with other nodes in nanoseconds

data.name: clock-offset.stddevnanos
data.description: Stdddev clock offset with other nodes in nanoseconds

SQL Layer Architecture Docs >>

name: KV Transaction Layer
description:
The KV Transaction Layer coordinates concurrent requests as key-value operations. To maintain consistency, this is also where the cluster manages time.

Transaction Layer Architecture Docs >>

data.name: txn.aborts
data.description: Number of aborted KV transactions

data.name: txn.commits
data.description: Number of committed KV transactions (including 1PC)

data.name: txn.commits1PC
data.description: Number of committed one-phase KV transactions

data.name: txn.autoretries
data.description: Number of automatic retries to avoid serializable restarts

data.name: txn.abandons
data.description: Number of abandoned KV transactions

name: Distribution Layer

Distribution Layer Architecture Docs >>

name: Replication Layer
description:
The Replication Layer maintains consistency between copies of ranges (known as replicas) through our consensus algorithm, Raft.

Replication Layer Architecture Docs >>

data.description: Number of SSTable ingestions proposed (i.e. sent to Raft by lease holders)

data.name: addsstable.applications
data.description: Number of SSTable ingestions applied (i.e. applied by Replicas)

data.name: addsstable.copies
data.description: number of SSTable ingestions that required copying files during application

data.name: queue.gc.process.success
data.description: Number of replicas successfully processed by the GC queue

data.name: queue.gc.process.failure
data.description: Number of replicas which failed processing in the GC queue

data.name: queue.gc.pending
data.description: Number of pending replicas in the GC queue

data.name: queue.gc.processingnanos
data.description: Nanoseconds spent processing replicas in the GC queue

name: Timeseries
description: Your cluster collects data about its own performance, which is used to power the very charts you're using, among other things.

data.name: timeseries.write.samples
data.description: Total number of metric samples written to disk

data.name: timeseries.write.bytes
data.description: Total size in bytes of metric samples written to disk

data.name: timeseries.write.errors
data.description: Total errors encountered while attempting to write metrics to disk

data.name: queue.tsmaintenance.process.success
data.description: Number of replicas successfully processed by the time series maintenance queue

data.name: queue.tsmaintenance.process.failure
data.description: Number of replicas which failed processing in the time series maintenance queue

data.name: queue.tsmaintenance.pending
data.description: Number of pending replicas in the time series maintenance queue

data.name: queue.tsmaintenance.processingnanos
data.description: Nanoseconds spent processing replicas in the time series maintenance queue
